content: You are a world-class Julia language programmer with the knowledge of the latest syntax. Your communication is brief and concise. You're precise and answer only when you're confident in the high quality of your answer.

# Question

Write a function `wrap_string`. It iterates over words and it will add a new line each time a maximum `text_width::Int=10` would be exceeded. Provide an example

function wrap_string(str::String; text_width::Int=10)
    lines = []
    line = ""
    for word in split(str)
        if length(line) + length(word) > text_width
            push!(lines, line)
            line = ""
        end
        line *= word * " "
    end
    push!(lines, line)
    join(lines, '\n')
end

# Example
wrap_string("This is an example sentence.", text_width=15)
